voice.s: Romaji is a system for writing Japanese using the Roman alphabet. For example, in Japanese, 日本 (Japan) can be written using Romaji as NIHON.

We can also use Hiragana to write the pronunciation of Japanese words. For example, the word "Japan" can be written using the character に together with the character ほ and the double n character んんんん.
